summary: This is an email chain from November 2, 2021, regarding the upcoming Finest Foundation Awards ceremony on November 9, 2021. It congratulates investigators from the NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation and Human Trafficking Task Force for their work on the Epstein case. The email includes logistical details for the award ceremony.

persons.name: Det
persons.role: Detective, NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation and Human Trafficking Task Force
persons.context: A detective on the NYPD/FBI task force who is a recipient of the Finest Foundation Award for work on the Epstein case. The email instructs recipients to RSVP to this detective.

connections.description: Both are investigators on the NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation and Human Trafficking Task Force who worked on the Epstein case and are being jointly recognized with an award.

events.title: Finest Foundation Awards Ceremony
events.description: An awards ceremony held at 1 PP Auditorium to recognize investigators, including those who worked on the Epstein case. Recipients are to appear in business attire at 1330 hours for a ceremony at 1500 hours.

locations: Patriot (likely a bar or restaurant mentioned for celebration)
keyFacts: Law enforcement investigators from the NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation and Human Trafficking Task Force were formally recognized with the Finest Foundation Award for their work on the Epstein case in November 2021.
The recognition indicates ongoing institutional acknowledgment of the investigative work related to the Epstein case years after his death.
The email chain shows coordination and celebration among NYPD and FBI personnel involved in the case.
